title: 35 Stogies in 2 Hours!!!
itunes:title: 35 Stogies in 2 Hours!!!
description: This week on The Cigar Authority special guests Sal LoNano (former manager of Micky Ward) and Evan Chaisson join hosts Dave, Chuck and Mr Jonathan as we smoke and review the 7 Contenders for "Cigar of the Year" - That's 35 Cigars in just 2 hours! Can the boys handle it? What stogies made the cut as contenders for Cigar of the Year, you ask? There's only one way to find out... sit back, light up and enjoy this week's record setting Ciagr Authority!
